entry.title: DeFacto will be at IEEE/ACM DATE 2021

link.title: DeFacto will be at IEEE/ACM DATE 2021

entry.content:
DeFacto will be present at the IEEE/ACM Conference on Design Automation and Test in Europe 2021. We will present the results achieved so far at the University Booth of the Conference.

DATE 2021 will be held virtually between the 1st and the 5th of February 2021.
entry.summary: DeFacto will be present at the IEEE/ACM Conference on Design Automation and Test in Europe 2021. We will present the results achieved so far at the University Booth of the Conference.
